name: Guardians of Konterah
description:
Guardians of Konterah is a cooperative, action, couch, boss rush game where you and your friends control small creatures that must defeat Giant bosses using powerful shields to counter their attacks and prevent the destruction of Konterah.

Keyboard Buttons Controls

WASD - Move

Left Click - Use Shield

Right Click - Dash(And skip Dialogues)

F - Heal Allies(Useless in single player)
